Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Jarred Taylor to discuss the Drinkin’ Bros Facebook group getting taken down for “violating” Facebook rules, big tech censorship of conservatives and other speech the left finds offensive, how to fight back against the government and huge corporations that are taking advantage of American citizens, and comedians fighting back against censorship.
